alert.note: Alert for Forrest (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:10PM CDT until August 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf River At Hattiesburg affecting Forrest County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf River At Hattiesburg. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Water begins to cover road at a trailer park about 3 miles downstream of the Highway 11 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 18.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.0 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Leaf River Hattiesbur 22.0 18.5 Wed 8 pm CDT 20.5 21.4 22.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 900 AM CDT.
